---
orphan: true
---

- Click here to log in at GitHub: [https://github.com/login](https://github.com/login).
- Enter your username or email and your password. Click `Sign in`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/UpdateNS00.png" width="400px" ></br>

- Select your own `cgm-remote-monitor` project (**not `nightscout/cgm-remote-monitor`**)</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/UpdateNS01.png" width="400px" ></br>

- Your repository will open. If you see `This branch is xxx commits behind nightscout:master` you need to update.
- Select `Fetch upstream`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/UpdateNS01a.png" width="700px" ></br>

- Select `Fetch and merge`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/UpdateNS01b.png" width="400px" ></br>

- After a moment, your repository should display `This branch is up to date with nightscout:master`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/UpdateNS01c.png" width="400px" ></br>

You have now updated your GitHub cgm-remote-monitor repository.

</br>

If you ran into trouble, you can [redeploy](/update/redeploy) the project.

</br>
